caller_intent: Shivan Sherman received a letter from the Department of Transportation (DNV) requesting Form FS-1 after switching insurance carriers and needs guidance on resolving the issue.
resolution_steps: Heather explains that the letter is common when switching carriers, as the old carrier (Liberty Mutual) notifies DNV of the cancellation.
Heather provides the email address (support@myallianceinsurance.com) for submitting the letter electronically.
She clarifies that submitting the form promptly ensures DNV processes it, avoiding potential delays.
She reassures Shivan that even if another letter arrives, the team can handle it and recommends contacting them if that happens.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance carrier transitions and DNV's requirements for Form FS-1
Knowledge of electronic submission processes for insurance-related documents
summary: Shivan Sherman received a DNV letter after switching insurance carriers. Heather from Alliance Insurance Services explained the letter's cause, provided the email address for submitting Form FS-1, and assured him the issue would be resolved once the form was submitted. The call concluded with Shivan agreeing to send the letter electronically.
